name: simple-sftp
description: Lightweight SFTP client with port forwarding and cross-device host configuration sync

virtualWorkspaces.description: This extension requires access to the local file system for SSH/SFTP operations and cannot run in virtual workspaces.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to Simple SFTP

No remote hosts configured yet. Get started by adding your first host to upload and download files via SFTP.

[$(add) Add Host](command:simpleSftp.addHost)

[$(cloud-download) Import from SSH Config](command:simpleSftp.importFromSshConfig)

Need help? Check out the [documentation](https://github.com/iwangbowen/simple-sftp#readme).

commands.title: Download from Remote Host to Here

simpleSftp.hosts.markdownDescription: Host configurations. This setting is automatically synced across devices via VS Code Settings Sync.

simpleSftp.groups.markdownDescription: Host groups. This setting is automatically synced across devices via VS Code Settings Sync.

simpleSftp.showDotFiles.description: Show hidden files and directories (dot files) when browsing remote files

simpleSftp.speedUnit.description: Download speed display unit. 'auto' will automatically choose between KB/s and MB/s based on speed

simpleSftp.transferQueue.maxConcurrent.description: Maximum number of concurrent file transfers

simpleSftp.transferQueue.maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed transfers

simpleSftp.transferQueue.historySize.description: Maximum number of transfer history records to keep

simpleSftp.verification.enabled.description: Verify file integrity after transfer using checksum. Requires md5sum/sha256sum tools on the remote server. Recommended for critical file transfers.

simpleSftp.verification.algorithm.description: Checksum algorithm to use for file verification. MD5 is faster but less secure. SHA256 is more secure but slower.

simpleSftp.verification.threshold.description: Minimum file size (in MB) for checksum verification. Default: 10 MB. Set to 0 to verify all files.

simpleSftp.ui.hideStatusBar.description: Hide the transfer status bar in the bottom status bar. Default: false (show status bar)

simpleSftp.transfer.preservePermissions.description: Preserve file permissions (chmod) during transfers. Requires SFTP server support.

simpleSftp.transfer.preserveTimestamps.description: Preserve file modification and access times during transfers. Requires SFTP server support.

simpleSftp.transfer.followSymlinks.description: Follow symbolic links and transfer the target file/folder instead of creating symlinks. Default: false (preserve symlinks)

simpleSftp.parallelTransfer.enabled.markdownDescription:
**⚠️ Advanced Feature**: Enable parallel chunk-based transfer for large files.

**Important**: This feature requires:
- Direct SFTP connection (not compatible with proxies, jump hosts, or tunnel-based connections)
- SFTP server support for concurrent connections
- Sufficient network bandwidth

**Known Issues**:
- May fail with proxy/bastion host setups
- May cause connection errors on some SFTP servers
- May require firewall configuration for multiple connections

Only enable if you understand the requirements and have tested it works in your environment.

simpleSftp.parallelTransfer.threshold.description: Minimum file size (in MB) to trigger parallel transfer. Default: 100 MB. Files smaller than this will use single-connection transfer.

simpleSftp.parallelTransfer.chunkSize.description: Size of each chunk in parallel transfer (in MB). Default: 10 MB. Larger chunks may be faster but use more memory. Range: 1-50 MB.

simpleSftp.parallelTransfer.maxConcurren.description: Maximum number of concurrent chunk transfers. Default: 5. Higher values may increase speed but require more connections and resources. Range: 1-10.

simpleSftp.browser.openInEditor.description: Open file browser in editor area instead of panel area. When enabled, allows opening multiple browser instances for different hosts.

simpleSftp.fileView.defaultLayout.description: Default file view layout in SFTP file browser. 'list' shows detailed table view, 'grid' shows icon/grid view with thumbnails.
enumDescriptions: List view - Shows files in a detailed table with columns (name, modified time, permissions, size)
Grid view - Shows files as icons/thumbnails in a grid layout (better for visual browsing)

simpleSftp.fileView.thumbnailSize.description: Thumbnail size for image files in grid view (in pixels). Larger sizes show more detail but use more memory.
enumDescriptions: Large (160x160) - Best quality, more memory usage
Open in VS Code Simple Browser (built-in preview)
simpleSftp.portForwarding.browserType.description: Browser type to use when clicking on port number or forwarded address

simpleSftp.portForwarding.defaultProtoco.description: Default protocol to use when opening browser for port forwarding

simpleSftp.browser.panelLayout.description: Default layout mode for the dual panel file browser

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
